articles.title: Pandemic: Queen Elizabeth II misses Royal Ascot racing meet for first time in reign - USA TODAY
articles.description: Queen Elizabeth II, the world's most famous horse-racing fan, will miss her favorite meet, Royal Ascot, while in pandemic lockdown at Windsor Castle.
articles.content:
Queen Elizabeth isnt going to let the coronavirus spoil all her 94th birthday festivities! Heres how she plans on celebrating one of her oldest birthday traditions.
